content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE PROC [StandardizedBank].[ProcedureTransaction] @ETL_DATE [INT] AS
BEGIN

TRUNCATE TABLE [Standardized].[H_TRANSACTION];

INSERT INTO [Standardized].[H_TRANSACTION] 
([Transaction HashKey]
,[Transaction Number]
,[Record Source]
,[Load Date])
SELECT 
Standardized.FunctionHashMD5('TRANSACTION' + '-' + ID ) AS [Transaction HashKey]
,ID AS [Transaction Number]
,'LandingBank.Card' AS [Record Source]
,CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE() ,103) AS [Load Date]
FROM [LandingBank].[CardTransaction] 
WHERE AMND_STATE='A' AND DATA_DATE=@ETL_DATE
;

END


-------
GO
